result.execSummary:
The defendant Clinton Randall Watkins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Clinton Randall Watkins is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Clinton Randall Watkins was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Cash bond applied to costs. 60 days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts.

COUNT ONE DISMISSED.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clinton Randall Watkins

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Filed by Atty Leonie Dolch
Filed by Atty Leonie Dolch

Defendant Clinton Randall Watkins in court with attorney Leonie Dolch.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count 2. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence: 85 days jail. $443 costs, cash bond applied, 60 days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts for the balance. 67 jail credit for time served. Ct. 1 dismissed.

Defendant Clinton Randall Watkins in court with attorney Jeremiah Wolfgang Meyer-O'Day.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court entered not guilty plea, jury trial to be set.
